languages.text: Огромные машины испарят породу на своем пути, пробивая путь к самым ценным минеральным залежам. Кланы серфов, обслуживающие их, никогда больше не увидят солнца, как и их потомки.
Gigantic machines will vaporise the rock in their path, clearing the way to the most valuable mineral deposits. The serf clans operating them will never again see the sun, nor will their descendants.
languages.original_text: Огромные машины испарят породу на своем пути, пробивая путь к самым ценным минеральным залежам. Кланы серфов, обслуживающие их, никогда больше не увидят солнца, как и их потомки.

traits.locale_text: Gigantic machines will vaporise the rock in their path, clearing the way to the most valuable mineral deposits. The serf clans operating the, will never again see the sun, nor will their descendants.

Gigantic machines will vaporise the rock in their path, clearing the way to the most valuable mineral deposits. The serf clans operating them will never again see the sun, nor will their descendants.

languages.text: De gigantesques machines vaporiseront la roche sur leur passage, dégageant l'accès aux gisements de minerai les plus précieux. Les clans de serfs qui les manœuvrent ne verront jamais plus la lumière du soleil, tout comme leurs descendants.
languages.original_text: Gigantic machines will vaporise the rock in their path, clearing the way to the most valuable mineral deposits. The serf clans operating them will never again see the sun, nor will their descendants.

traits.locale_text: De gigantesques machines vaporiseront la roche sur leur passage, dégageant l'accès aux gisements de minerai les plus précieux. Les clans de serfs qui les manœuvrent ne verront jamais plus la lumière du soleil, tout comme leurs descendants.

languages.text: 巨大な機械が行く手の岩石を蒸発させ、最も貴重な鉱脈への道を切り開く。それを操る農奴の一族は、その子孫に渡るまで、二度と太陽を目にすることはないだろう。
languages.original_text: Gigantic machines will vaporise the rock in their path, clearing the way to the most valuable mineral deposits. The serf clans operating them will never again see the sun, nor will their descendants.

traits.locale_text: 巨大な機械が行く手の岩石を蒸発させ、最も貴重な鉱脈への道を切り開く。それを操る農奴の一族は、その子孫に渡るまで、二度と太陽を目にすることはないだろう。

languages.text: 巨大的机器将汽化沿途所经的岩石，扫清通往珍贵矿藏的道路。仆役氏族及其子孙后代将终生操纵机器，永远不见天日。
languages.original_text: Gigantic machines will vaporise the rock in their path, clearing the way to the most valuable mineral deposits. The serf clans operating them will never again see the sun, nor will their descendants.

traits.locale_text: 巨大的机器将汽化沿途所经的岩石，扫清通往珍贵矿藏的道路。仆役氏族及其子孙后代将终生操纵机器，永远不见天日。

languages.text: Máquinas gigantescas vaporizarán la roca a su paso, despejando el camino hacia los yacimientos minerales más valiosos. Los clanes de siervos que las manejen no volverán a ver el sol, ni tampoco sus descendientes.
languages.original_text: Gigantic machines will vaporise the rock in their path, clearing the way to the most valuable mineral deposits. The serf clans operating them will never again see the sun, nor will their descendants.

traits.locale_text: Máquinas gigantescas vaporizarán la roca a su paso, despejando el camino hacia los yacimientos minerales más valiosos. Los clanes de siervos que las manejen no volverán a ver el sol, ni tampoco sus descendientes.

languages.text: Gigantische Maschinen pulverisieren den Fels, der ihnen im Weg steht, und machen so den Weg zu den wertvollsten Mineralienvorkommen frei. Die Sklavenclans, die die Maschinen bedienen, werden nie wieder die Sonne sehen. Und auch ihre Nachfahren nicht.
languages.original_text: Gigantic machines will vaporise the rock in their path, clearing the way to the most valuable mineral deposits. The serf clans operating them will never again see the sun, nor will their descendants.

traits.locale_text: Gigantische Maschinen pulverisieren den Fels, der ihnen im Weg steht, und machen so den Weg zu den wertvollsten Mineralienvorkommen frei. Die Sklavenclans, die die Maschinen bedienen, werden nie wieder die Sonne sehen. Und auch ihre Nachfahren nicht.

languages.text: Devasa makineler, yollarına çıkan kayaları tuzla buz ederek en değerli mineral yataklarına ulaşmayı sağlayacak. Ne bunları idare eden serf klanları ne de torunları tekrar güneşi görebilecek.
languages.original_text: Gigantic machines will vaporise the rock in their path, clearing the way to the most valuable mineral deposits. The serf clans operating them will never again see the sun, nor will their descendants.
